# read data
```{r}
swow = read_csv('../swow_strengths.csv')
nodes_list = read_csv('nodes_list.csv')
main = swow %>% filter(cue %in% nodes_list$word & response %in% nodes_list$word)

nodes = main  %>% select(cue) %>% distinct() %>% rename(Id = cue)
edges = main %>% rename(Source = cue, Target = response, Weight = R123.Strength)
write_csv(nodes, file = "nodes.csv")
write_csv(edges, file = "edges.csv")

```
